amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out the funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program and to prohibit the use of funds to provide loans from the program's unused lending capacity.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program and to prohibit the use of funds to provide a loan under the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 250 (Roll no. 206).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanford amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 250 (Roll no. 206).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Sanford.
